page.title: 14Princetown C.P. School
page.content: There is only one school in the village with 95 children on roll at the moment. The children are aged between 5 and 11 and arranged in four classes. When they leave this school they go to Tavistock Comprehensive. Not all the children come from Princetown. 13 children travel in by mini-bus from Bellever and Postbridge, 6 come from Hexworthy and 1 from Merrivale.Sometimes in the winter when the roads are blocked with snow they cannot come in but this doesn't happen very often. We have lots of interesting equipment we can use; two computers, a film projector, colour T.V.,a video and lots of gymnastic apparatus and a swimming pool.My favourite lesson is swimming which is essential on Dartmoor as there are lots of rivers to fall in.
